subject: Dear Compliment of the day
body:
Dear Compliment of the day
This is to inform you that the Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) Mr. Godwin Emefiele  and  Mr. Abdulrasheed Bawa the Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) have been sacked  by the New President of Nigeria Mr. Bola Ahmed Tinubu.for being too corrupt in handling our Contract awarded Fund, Inheritance Fund and diplomatic consignment Fund ,.
 
You are hereby advised to stop any form of communications with whoever you are communicating  with regarding your contract fund /  Inheritance Fund.    The new President of Nigeria Mr. Bola Ahmed Tinubu has directed that all pending  Contract awarded Fund, Inheritance Fund and diplomatic consignment Fund should be reviewed and released to their Beneficiary within three working days without them paying any illegal upfront fee .
As a matter of urgency send your current direct telephone number as you replied for better secure communications .
Yours Sincerely
Olisa Mba
Special Duties / International debts verification Unit
Office of the President
Federal Government of Nigeria

subject: Re:   Dear Compliment of the day
body:
Dear Olisa Mba,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring transparency and efficiency in handling these matters.

However, I must inform you that I have not been involved in any contract or fund with the Central Bank of Nigeria or any other entity. Therefore, I believe there may be a misunderstanding or mistake.

Please verify the details and let me know if there is anything else required from my end.

Best wishes,
Dustin
